byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta and Ivan Nechepurenko contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Adding to tensions between Russia and the West, Russia’s United Nations ambassador said a report that Syrian forces had used chemical weapons was unconvincing.
snippet: Adding to tensions between Russia and the West, Russia’s United Nations ambassador said a report that Syrian forces had used chemical weapons was unconvincing....

headline.main: Bitter Rift Deepens as Russia Rejects Findings on Syria’s Use of Chlorine Bombs
